revised_title: Automatic Registration of Magnetometers and Meteorological Instruments
tldr: Charles Brooke describes the construction and use of a photographic instrument for registering magnetometer and meteorological data. He also explains the preparation of sensitive photographic paper and the adjustments needed for accuracy. In a supplement, he discusses methods for registering barometer and thermometer heights using the same apparatus.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Atmospheric Science
